name: Ria_(smuggler)
content:
Ria was a female Twi'lek smuggler and contraband dealer who operated out of the city of Narmle on Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
Ria was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Ria was added to the game along with the smuggling missions introduced with the "Chapter 3" update, released on September 27, 2006.
